dict.string: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS item_artist;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS album_artist;
ALTER TABLE artist RENAME TO album_artist;
CREATE TABLE item_artist (pid INTEGER NOT NULL, kind INTEGER, artwork_status INTEGER, artwork_album_pid INTEGER, name TEXT, name_order INTEGER, sort_name TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (pid));
INSERT INTO item_artist (pid, name, sort_name) SELECT random(), item.artist, item.sort_artist FROM item GROUP BY item.artist;
CREATE INDEX TempItemArtistNameIndex ON item_artist (name);
UPDATE item SET artist_pid = (SELECT item_artist.pid FROM item_artist WHERE item_artist.name = item.artist);
DROP INDEX TempItemArtistNameIndex;
CREATE INDEX Artist2TmpIndexForUpdateTableWithArtworkAlbumPID ON item (artist_pid);
DROP INDEX Artist2TmpIndexForUpdateTableWithArtworkAlbumPID;
UPDATE item_artist SET artwork_album_pid = IFNULL((SELECT item.album_pid FROM item WHERE item.artwork_cache_id > 0 AND item.artist_pid = item_artist.pid ORDER BY item.album_order LIMIT 1), 0);
UPDATE item_artist SET artwork_album_pid = IFNULL((SELECT item.album_pid FROM item WHERE item.artwork_cache_id < 0 AND item.artist_pid = item_artist.pid ORDER BY item.album_order LIMIT 1), 0);
DELETE FROM album WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT item.pid FROM item WHERE item.album_pid = album.pid LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM album_artist WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT album.pid FROM album WHERE album.artist_pid = album_artist.pid LIMIT 1);
UPDATE item SET album = (SELECT album.name FROM album WHERE item.album_pid = album.pid), sort_album = (SELECT album.sort_name FROM album WHERE item.album_pid = album.pid);
UPDATE item SET is_song = 1 WHERE is_music_video = 1;
UPDATE item SET artist = '' WHERE artist IS NULL;
UPDATE item SET album = '' WHERE album IS NULL;
UPDATE item SET title = '' WHERE title IS NULL;
UPDATE item SET composer = '' WHERE composer IS NULL;
UPDATE album SET name = '' WHERE name IS NULL;
UPDATE item_artist SET name = '' WHERE name IS NULL;
UPDATE composer SET name = '' WHERE name IS NULL;

UPDATE item SET album = (SELECT title FROM item i2 WHERE i2.album_pid = item.album_pid ORDER BY title_order LIMIT 1), sort_album = (SELECT sort_title FROM item i3 WHERE i3.album_pid = item.album_pid ORDER BY title_order LIMIT 1) WHERE (album = 'Audible' OR ALBUM = '' OR ALBUM IS NULL) AND (media_kind&8) AND (media_kind & 32768)==0 AND is_rental==0 AND ((SELECT audio_format FROM avformat_info WHERE item_pid = item.pid) >= 401) AND ((SELECT audio_format FROM avformat_info WHERE item_pid = item.pid) <= 406) AND ((SELECT sub_id FROM avformat_info WHERE item_pid = item.pid) == 0);
UPDATE item SET album = IFNULL((SELECT season_number FROM video_info WHERE video_info.item_pid = item.pid), '') WHERE (album IS NULL OR album = '') AND is_tv_show = 1;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS extras.chapter (item_pid INTEGER NOT NULL, data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (item_pid));
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN in_songs_collection INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_in_songs_collection

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_in_songs_collection AFTER UPDATE OF media_kind, is_rental ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET in_songs_collection = ((item.media_kind&1) AND ((item.media_kind&2)=0 AND item.is_rental=0)) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN title_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;

UPDATE item SET title_blank = (title = '' OR title IS NULL), artist_blank = (artist = '' OR artist IS NULL), composer_blank = (composer = '' OR composer IS NULL), album_blank = (album = '' OR album IS NULL), album_artist_blank = (album_artist = '' OR album_artist IS NULL), in_songs_collection = ((media_kind&33) AND ((media_kind&2)=0 AND is_rental=0));
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_title_blank;
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_title_blank AFTER UPDATE OF title ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET title_blank = (title = '' OR title IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN artist_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_artist_blank;
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_artist_blank AFTER UPDATE OF item_artist ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET artist_blank = (artist = '' OR artist IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN album_artist_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_album_artist_blank;

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_album_artist_blank AFTER UPDATE OF album_artist ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET album_artist_blank = (album_artist = '' OR album_artist IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN album_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_album_blank;
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_album_blank AFTER UPDATE OF album ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET album_blank = (album = '' OR album IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN composer_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_composer_blank;
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_composer_blank AFTER UPDATE OF composer ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET composer_blank = (composer = '' OR composer IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN grouping_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE item SET grouping_blank = (grouping = '' OR grouping IS NULL);
ALTER TABLE genre_map ADD COLUMN genre_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_grouping_blank;
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_item_grouping_blank AFTER UPDATE OF grouping ON item BEGIN UPDATE item SET grouping_blank = (grouping = '' OR grouping IS NULL) WHERE item.pid = new.pid; END;

UPDATE item SET sort_title = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_title, title), ''), sort_artist = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_artist, artist), ''), sort_album = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_album, album), ''), album_artist = IFNULL(IFNULL(album_artist, artist), ''), sort_album_artist = IFNULL(IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_album_artist, album_artist), IFNULL(sort_artist, artist)), ''), sort_composer = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_composer, composer), '') WHERE is_compilation = 0;

UPDATE item SET sort_title = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_title, title), ''), sort_artist = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_artist, artist), ''), sort_album = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_album, album), ''), sort_composer = IFNULL(IFNULL(sort_composer, composer), '') WHERE is_compilation != 0;
UPDATE video_info SET sort_series_name = IFNULL(sort_series_name, series_name);
UPDATE album SET name = IFNULL(name, ''); -- do not update sort_name, because we create that ourselves
UPDATE album_artist SET sort_name = IFNULL(IFNULL((CASE sort_name WHEN '' THEN name ELSE sort_name END), name), ''), name = IFNULL(name, '');
UPDATE item_artist SET sort_name = IFNULL(IFNULL((CASE sort_name WHEN '' THEN name ELSE sort_name END), name), ''), name = IFNULL(name, '');
UPDATE composer SET sort_name = IFNULL(IFNULL((CASE sort_name WHEN '' THEN name ELSE sort_name END), name), ''), name = IFNULL(name, '');
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN sort_title_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN sort_artist_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN sort_album_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN sort_album_artist_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN sort_composer_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN genre_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN title_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN artist_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN album_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN album_artist_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN composer_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN genre_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN series_name_section_order BLOB;
ALTER TABLE album ADD COLUMN sort_name TEXT;
ALTER TABLE album ADD COLUMN artist TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '';
UPDATE album SET artist=IFNULL((SELECT name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), '');
ALTER TABLE album ADD COLUMN sort_artist TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '';
UPDATE album SET sort_artist=IFNULL((SELECT sort_name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), '');
ALTER TABLE album ADD COLUMN sort_artist_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE album SET sort_artist_section=IFNULL((SELECT sort_name_section FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), 0);
UPDATE album SET sort_name=IFNULL((SELECT sort_album FROM item WHERE album.pid=item.album_pid AND sort_album NOT NULL LIMIT 1), '') WHERE sort_name IS NULL;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN is_audible_audio_book NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE item ADD COLUMN is_itunes_u NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;

UPDATE item SET is_audible_audio_book = IFNULL(((SELECT audio_format FROM avformat_info WHERE item_pid = item.pid) BETWEEN 401 AND 406) AND ((SELECT sub_id FROM avformat_info WHERE item_pid = item.pid) = 0), 0);
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_is_kind_of_field;
DELETE FROM item_to_container WHERE container_pid IN (SELECT container.pid FROM container WHERE container.smart_is_dynamic = 1);
UPDATE container SET media_kinds = 2147483647 WHERE smart_is_dynamic = 1;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_sort_title;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_item_media_kind;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_media_kind ON item (media_kind);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS item_to_container (item_pid INTEGER, container_pid INTEGER, physical_order INTEGER);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_is_compilation ON item (is_compilation);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_genius_id ON item (genius_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS avformat_info_idx_audio_format ON avformat_info (audio_format);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS itc_idx_physical_order ON item_to_container (container_pid, physical_order);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS itc_idx_item_pid ON item_to_container (item_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS container_is_hidden_distinguished_kind_index ON container (is_hidden, distinguished_kind);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ext_item_view_membership;
CREATE TABLE ext_item_view_membership (item_pid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, movie_mbr INTEGER, movie_rental_mbr INTEGER );
INSERT INTO ext_item_view_membership (item_pid, movie_mbr, movie_rental_mbr) SELECT pid, (is_movie AND (NOT is_rental) AND (NOT is_podcast)), (is_movie AND is_rental) FROM item;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_genre_id ON item (genre_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_title ON item (title);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_artist ON item (artist);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_artist_pid ON item (artist_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_album ON item (album);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_album_pid ON item (album_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_composer ON item (composer);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_composer_pid ON item (composer_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_movies_nonempty ON item (is_movie, is_podcast, is_itunes_u, is_rental, album_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_tvshows_nonempty ON item (is_tv_show, is_itunes_u, is_rental, album_pid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_music_videos_nonempty ON item (is_music_video, is_itunes_u, is_rental);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS item_idx_itunes_u_nonempty ON item (is_itunes_u, is_rental, album_blank, album_pid);
ALTER TABLE item_artist ADD COLUMN has_song INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE item_artist SET has_song = IFNULL((SELECT 1 FROM item WHERE is_song = 1 AND artist_pid = item_artist.ROWID LIMIT 1), 0);
ALTER TABLE item_artist ADD COLUMN has_audio_book INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE item_artist SET has_audio_book = IFNULL((SELECT 1 FROM item WHERE is_audio_book = 1 AND artist_pid = item_artist.ROWID LIMIT 1), 0);

UPDATE album SET has_song = IFNULL((SELECT 1 FROM item WHERE is_song = 1 AND album_pid = album.ROWID LIMIT 1), 0);

UPDATE genre_map SET has_song = IFNULL((SELECT 1 FROM item WHERE is_song = 1 AND genre_id = genre_map.ROWID LIMIT 1), 0);

UPDATE genre_map SET has_compilation = IFNULL((SELECT 1 FROM item WHERE is_compilation = 1 AND genre_id = genre_map.ROWID LIMIT 1), 0);
ALTER TABLE album_artist ADD COLUMN name_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE album_artist SET name_blank = 1 WHERE (name = '' OR name IS NULL);
ALTER TABLE item_artist ADD COLUMN name_blank INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
UPDATE item_artist SET name_blank = 1 WHERE (name = '' OR name IS NULL);

ALTER TABLE item_artist ADD COLUMN sort_name_section INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;

ANALYZE;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ml_database_status (key TEXT, value TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(key));
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_song;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_audio_book;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_music_video;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_tv_show;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_ringtone;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_voice_memo;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_rental;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_podcast;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_itunes_u;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_audible_audio_book;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_collections_update_is_compilation;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_album_insert;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_album_insert AFTER INSERT ON album FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE album SET name_blank = (name = '' OR name IS NULL), sort_name_section = ML3Section(sort_name), artist = IFNULL((SELECT name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), ''), sort_artist = IFNULL((SELECT sort_name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), ''), sort_artist_section = IFNULL((SELECT sort_name_section FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), '') WHERE album.pid = NEW.pid; END;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_album_update_artist_pid;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_album_update_artist_pid AFTER UPDATE OF artist_pid ON album FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE album SET artist = IFNULL((SELECT name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), ''), sort_artist = IFNULL((SELECT sort_name FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), ''), sort_artist_section = IFNULL((SELECT sort_name_section FROM album_artist WHERE album_artist.pid = album.artist_pid), '') WHERE album.pid = NEW.pid; END;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_album_artist_insert;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_album_artist_insert AFTER INSERT ON album_artist FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE album_artist SET name_blank = (name = '' OR name IS NULL), sort_name_section = ML3Section(sort_name) WHERE album_artist.pid = NEW.pid; END;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_item_artist_insert;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_item_artist_insert AFTER INSERT ON item_artist FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE item_artist SET name_blank = (name = '' OR name IS NULL), sort_name_section = ML3Section(sort_name) WHERE item_artist.pid = NEW.pid; END;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_composer_insert;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_composer_insert AFTER INSERT ON composer FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE composer SET name_blank = (name = '' OR name IS NULL), sort_name_section = ML3Section(sort_name) WHERE composer.pid = NEW.pid; END;
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_genre_insert;

CREATE TRIGGER trigger_genre_insert AFTER INSERT ON genre_map FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE genre_map SET genre_blank = (genre = '' OR genre IS NULL), genre_section = ML3Section(genre) WHERE genre_map.id = NEW.id; END;
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO ml_database_status (key, value) VALUES ('iTunesCommandsExecuted', '22');
